name: Growing Up (HannahWebb42)
description:
Made for the Month Long Game Jam (Theme: Grow) and for Ludum Dare (Theme: Small World)

You're a small bear who has lost it's mom. Maybe that's okay. Maybe it's time to learn new skills of your own.

Stay happy, experiment, and find your mom. No rush. It's a small world, so you'll find her eventually. :)

--ALL assets in this game were made by me :) (other than the fonts)--
